00020             // Note: No assert hook on SPU
00021             #include "spu_printf.h"
00022             #include "libsn_spu.h"
00023             #define AKASSERT(Condition)                                                             \
00024                 if ( !(Condition) )                                                                 \
00025                 {                                                                                   \
00026                     spu_printf( "Assertion triggered in file %s at line %d\n", __FILE__, __LINE__ );\
00027                     /*snPause();*/                                                                  \
00028                 }                                                                   
00029 
00030         #else // defined( __SPU__ )
00031 
00032             #ifndef AK_ASSERT_HOOK
00033                 AK_CALLBACK( void, AkAssertHook)( 
00034                                         const char * in_pszExpression,  
00035                                         const char * in_pszFileName,    
00036                                         int in_lineNumber               
00037                                         );
00038                 #define AK_ASSERT_HOOK
00039             #endif
00040 
00041             extern AKSOUNDENGINE_API AkAssertHook g_pAssertHook;
00042 
00043             #if defined( AK_WII_FAMILY )
00044 
00045                     inline void _AkAssertHook(
00046                                     bool bcondition,
00047                                     const char * in_pszExpression,
00048                                     const char * in_pszFileName,
00049                                     int in_lineNumber
00050                                     )
00051                     {
00052                         if( !bcondition )
00053                             g_pAssertHook( in_pszExpression, in_pszFileName, in_lineNumber);
00054                     }
00055 
00056                     #define AKASSERT(Condition) if ( g_pAssertHook )   \
00057                                                     _AkAssertHook((bool)(Condition), #Condition, __FILE__, __LINE__); \
00058                                                 else                                \
00059                                                 { \
00060                                                     if (!(bool)(Condition)) \
00061                                                     { \
00062                                                         OSHalt(#Condition); \
00063                                                     } \
00064                                                 }
00065             #elif defined( AK_APPLE )
00066                     #include <TargetConditionals.h>
00067                     #define CallDebugger pthread_kill (pthread_self(), SIGTRAP);
00068 
00069                     inline void _MacAssert( const char * in_pFunc , const char * in_pFile , unsigned in_LineNum, const char * in_pCondition )
00070                     {
00071                         printf ("%s:%u:%s failed assertion `%s'\n", in_pFile, in_LineNum, in_pFunc, in_pCondition);
00072                         CallDebugger
00073                     }
00074 
00075                     #define _AkAssertHook(_Expression) ( (_Expression) || (g_pAssertHook( #_Expression, __FILE__, __LINE__), 0) )
00076 
00077                     #define AKASSERT(Condition) if ( g_pAssertHook )   \
00078                                                 _AkAssertHook(Condition);          \
00079                     else                                \
00080                                                 (__builtin_expect(!(Condition), 0) ? _MacAssert(__func__, __FILE__, __LINE__, #Condition) : (void)0)    
00081 
00082             #elif defined( AK_VITA )
00083                 
00084                 #define _AkAssertHook(_Expression) ( (_Expression) || (g_pAssertHook( #_Expression, __FILE__, __LINE__), 0) )
00085 
00086                 #define AKASSERT(Condition)         \
00087                     _Pragma( "diag_push" )          \
00088                     _Pragma( "diag_suppress=237" )  \
00089                     _Pragma( "diag_suppress=112" )  \
00090                     if ( g_pAssertHook )            \
00091                         _AkAssertHook(Condition);   \
00092                     else                            \
00093                         assert(Condition);          \
00094                     _Pragma( "diag_pop" )
00095 
00096             #elif defined( AK_ANDROID )
00097                 #include <android/log.h>
00098                 inline void _AndroidAssert( const char * in_pFunc , const char * in_pFile , unsigned in_LineNum, const char * in_pCondition )
00099                 {
00100                     __android_log_print(ANDROID_LOG_INFO, "AKASSERT","%s:%u:%s failed assertion `%s'\n", in_pFile, in_LineNum, in_pFunc, in_pCondition);
00101                 }
00102                 
00103                 #define _AkAssertHook(_Expression) ( (_Expression) || (g_pAssertHook( #_Expression, __FILE__, __LINE__), 0) )
00104 
00105 
00106                 #define AKASSERT(Condition) if ( g_pAssertHook )   \
00107                                                 _AkAssertHook(Condition);          \
00108                                             else \
00109                                                 (__builtin_expect(!(Condition), 0) ? _AndroidAssert(__func__, __FILE__, __LINE__, #Condition) : (void)0)
00110             #else
00111                 
00112                 #define _AkAssertHook(_Expression) ( (_Expression) || (g_pAssertHook( #_Expression, __FILE__, __LINE__), 0) )
00113 
00114                 #define AKASSERT(Condition) if ( g_pAssertHook )   \
00115                                                 _AkAssertHook(Condition);          \
00116                                             else                                \
00117                                                 assert(Condition)

00132     #define AKASSERT_RANGE(Value, Min, Max) (AKASSERT(((Value) >= (Min)) && ((Value) <= (Max))))
00133 
00134     #define AKASSERTANDRETURN( __Expression, __ErrorCode )\
00135         if (!(__Expression))\
00136         {\
00137             AKASSERT(__Expression);\
00138             return __ErrorCode;\
00139         }\
00140 
00141     #define AKASSERTPOINTERORFAIL( __Pointer ) AKASSERTANDRETURN( __Pointer != NULL, AK_Fail )
00142     #define AKASSERTSUCCESSORRETURN( __akr ) AKASSERTANDRETURN( __akr == AK_Success, __akr )
00143 
00144     #define AKASSERTPOINTERORRETURN( __Pointer ) \
00145         if ((__Pointer) == NULL)\
00146         {\
00147             AKASSERT((__Pointer) == NULL);\
00148             return ;\
00149         }\
00150 
00151     #if defined( AK_WIN ) && ( _MSC_VER >= 1600 )
00152         // Compile-time assert
00153         #define AKSTATICASSERT( __expr__, __msg__ ) static_assert( (__expr__), (__msg__) )
00154     #else
00155         // Compile-time assert
00156         #define AKSTATICASSERT( __expr__, __msg__ ) typedef char __AKSTATICASSERT__[(__expr__)?1:-1]
00157     #endif
